I lead on student transition within the School, with a focus on supporting students entering through diverse pathways and enhancing their academic and social integration. Prior to joining the University of Glasgow, I held Lecturer posts at INTO Glasgow Caledonian University (January–August 2018) and Glasgow Clyde College (2014–2018), where I taught Computing and supported international and college learners. My academic background is interdisciplinary. I completed a PhD at the University of the West of Scotland, where my research focused on feedback delivery methods, particularly the use of mobile technology to support assessment feedback in higher education.
